content: made to measure the finished scrunchie is roughly 4 across the difficulty is listed as easy but is achievable by anyone familiar with the following techniques joining/crocheting in the round changing colors carrying floats and whip stitch materials about 20g or 75 yds of any dk weight yarn 3 5 mm hook 1 stitch marker scissors tapestry needle ruler or measuring tape an elastic hair tie i use seamless ties that stretch comfortably to a 16 circumference
